mapper.insert: MERGE INTO MOVIE_CREW mc USING (SELECT #{person_id} AS person_id, #{movie_id} AS movie_id FROM DUAL) src ON (mc.person_id = src.person_id AND mc.movie_id = src.movie_id) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET mc.crew_job = #{crew_job} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (person_id, movie_id, crew_job) VALUES (#{person_id}, #{movie_id}, #{crew_job})
mapper.select: SELECT p.person_id, p.person_name, p.profile_path, mc.crew_job FROM MOVIE_CREW mc JOIN PERSON p ON mc.person_id = p.person_id WHERE mc.movie_id = #{movie_id} AND mc.crew_job = 'Director'
